data.message: do a song with Hopsin and Tech9

replies.message: Hopsin is whack though, he's unoriginal, contradicts himself, and he's basically tryna be slim shady. Niner's dope though.

Yea, I agree with Cristian...I heard a song from hopsin that sounded just like a slim shady song from back in the day...and it turned me from him real quick, sorry but color contacts aren't going to get you to the top budday...well, in these days of rap who knows?

all these new teens are dangling from a teet still, and can't handle nor understand real rap...rather put on makeup and see how much blood they can cut off to their feet with the skinny's...haha! Thanks for all those precious lullabies, but Imma need a little more than that to get my head bumpin. Need a new dre in this world... thank god eminem is still making music, or id probably be done with it... silent rides to work. AND where the hell is fabulous at? Thought he'd be the next big thing, or make a comeback...guess not.
nine's dope..I fell in love wid his great multies n complex rhyme schemes. would actually wanna see him on a track wid shady
Hopsin,tech n9ne, and brotha lynch hung.
